headline: 2 AI Energy Stocks to Buy Now that Might Be the Next Oklo
summary: Investors looking for the next Oklo might want to buy Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy) energy storage company Microvast, which trades for under $5 a share, and speculative microreactor stock Nano Nuclear Energy.
